title: I am a solo player and I want to play with/against solo players
body: Title. It is that simple. I am tired of explaining why. I have said this dozens of times in this boards. Many others have done this as well.  I do not want premades neither in my team, nor in the enemy team. It is that simple. I could explain all the reasons, but I believe Riot employees have read them all during this season. And we all know them. I feel those topics should not stop, because lot of us what the true Solo Queue.

replies.body:
DQ is just an unpleasant game environment.

The solo players aren't allowed to even know when they are with premades.  

But if something goes wrong, its the ones not in the group who will get targeted for harassment, and they won't understand why.

I was blamed for being a "useless trash jungler" despite getting all lanes fed, because my boosted silver ADC in a "plat" game refuses to hit towers and wants to farm to 6 slots for "late game". Then I figure out that mid and bot are a trio.

God how i hate that. 
When i'm playing my mid with a strong midgame champion (zed, lb or gp) and win so hard that we could easily end the game around 25 mins and the other losing lanes come up with: we win that late and proceed to just farm into 50 minutes where we will finally lose the game u KNOW they are boosted af.

> [{quoted}](name=Phun9837,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yyEA0AAO,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-05-15T09:32:10.376+0000)
>
> This is something I don't get. I frequently play ranked as 2-4 man premade, and if the game isn't going well because of my friends, I'll tell them. To be honest, I think banter like that is really fun when playing with friends. I think you just get the impression that premades only flame solos because (in most cases) they won't use the chat to "flame" their premades, but will use it to flame the solo players.

I started playing ranked to avoid premade groups around Season 2/3.  League was magically a much healthier place.

It doesn't take a very big leap of imagination to understand why and how premades are abusive.  

I see it all the time, both directed against me and against another solo on the team in the case of 3x premades where I am outperforming.

When you need someone to blame, you are going to look outside your group of friends. That shouldn't be hard to understand.  It's also not difficult to understand that quite a lot of people get upset when they lose, regardless of the reasons for it, and like to direct that anger and frustration onto another person.

The solo player is basically at the mercy of the premade. They technically aren't allowed to quit the game, and would have to mute the entire team to avoid the trash talking and even then, they have to stress about the premade soliciting reports and opinions from other players and whether or not it will get them in trouble.

It's not fun. I don't want to mute my entire team just to be able to survive a 30-50 minute game.

The worst is when you're solo and your whole team is solo too.

Then after the game you realize over half their team is pre-made...

Concur.

True Solo Queue please.

at this point i don't even care what game mode, ranked or unranked, I just want something that can allow solos to compete against solos.

The ironic thing is, everything that is catered towards premades NEEDS solo players to work, and yet those exact solos are fucked the hardest
True Solo Queue is what a lot of people want
True Solo Q would make me comeback to League I won't even deny it. That simple

Riot has pretty much told solo queue players to go fuck themselves at this point.

I'm playing for a bit during this awkward period between Overwatch beta end and release, but this game is pretty much dead. I hope there is a special place in game design unemployment hell for the idiots calling the shots over at Riot right now.
i keep saying, i hated duo que already and now i get quad ques :((
Agreed
They are pretending not hearing their customers' need.
Yup, Want the real soloQ back please

I am a soloist support.

I dont care if i am with premades or against premades as long as my ADC is not an idiot.
No SoloQ = No more RP
Why can I get other solos in my games but no-one else can...

it would actually be more fair to lump all of the pre-made teams into a team builder/team filler queue to go against full 5x pre-made teams than to put true solo queuers into matches against 2-man, 3-man, and 4-mans

it's really not fair to enter solo queue and have to play against a pre-made team that has experience together, possibly team speak, and higher level of communication than 5 random strangers... it's really not a solo queue, or built in mind for people who actually login and play solo.

solo queue rank isn't real, it's basically duo/pre-made rank

also, people who actually queue up solo have so many more disadvantages by sheer probability alone compared to pre-mades:
-1-4x more trolls
-1-4x more afk
-1-4x more feeders
-1-4x more d/c's
-1-4x more "generally less skilled team mates"
-1-4x less thought out team composition/synergy
-1-4x less adapted play styles/familiarity
-1-4x less communication/team speak

really just a lot of disadvantages of playing solo, and it can be so inversely beneficial to be pre-made, but it's all lumped into solo queue....

I feel the solo and duo queue should come back instead of dynamic queue tbh. 

As a support main, it's frustrating going solo because my adc an I may not synergize well and that's frustrating. WhIle I'm all for true solo queue I also am for dynamic queue/duo queue because it's honestly hard to find an adc you mesh with and I hate that a lack of synergy in my lane can demoralize my entire team.

No one wants to be the reason team morale is so low and if I can avoid that I'd very much like to.

The thing most people don't get is this queue existed before, in normals.

Now it exists in ranked too.


I stopped playing normals in s2 because I got tired of playing with 3/4 man premades and ranked offered a way to be solo and only play with duos at max. I stopped playing this season because there isn't a queue for that anymore.

There is so much more variance in the ladder because of this system. It's just ridiculous that it's gone on this long, pretty sure I wouldn't even come back if they added solo queue at this point. Whole seasons been a joke, they're basically going from s5-s7 with one long pre-season in between the two. Just compare the MSI games or whatever tourney they're holding right now to what the actual current game looks like. Is it the same? Not even close. Those types of changes mid season are generally reserved for "oh if we really mess it up pre-season we can change it before the season starts".
fully agree, league has become somewhat un-enjoyable since there is premades everywhere, being singled out every game, flame, no help, being reported for nothing, the list goes on

"A lot of us" being maybe a couple thousand, probably less than that on these boards. I haven't seen a thread with the Op upvoted more than a couple hundred times.

I believe most people are happy with Dynamic queue.
I believe you are wrong, now we both stated opinions with no basis.

Nah, look at the threads. The sample size is tiny. The boards represents the boards and that's it.

None of the people I've played with, wither with a team queue of four or five, or solo queuing, has had a problem with dynamic queue.

A very, very tiny minority of the playerbase visits the boards. This is not an opinion with no basis, this is a cold, hard fact.

Well by that logic, only a fairly small number of players grind ranked at all.   An even smaller number make it to high elo.  An ever SMALLER number become pro players and play in the LCS or at worlds.

Yet, Riot often makes choices based around the games played by those handful of players at the professional level.  A lot of said pro players have spoken out about disliking dynamic queue.  

Riot isn't changing it because they're stubborn and refuse to admit their new thing is awful... not because they're blind to the outcry against it OR because they don't feel enough people are upset about it.  They started it to get more people to drag their friends into league... and they're not going to drop it because backpedaling on a choice they've made offends them somehow.

Totally different situations, all based on skill. Esports is highly lucrative both financially and in terms of bringing people into the fold of League of Legends. It is much more visible than the forums, and the game in general. They balance around those high skill people because they are the ones people look up to and strive to be.

You do not hear much, if anything, from the multitudes of people who do enjoy dynamic queue. You only hear from the people who don't.

It has nothing to do with stubbornness. 

And you can't really speak as to their decision making processes.

Really, just a poor, emotional argument.

Looking at the cold hard facts - less people complain about solo queue than either people who don't like it and don't come to the forums to complain or the people who actually enjoy it.

Hell, many of my friends only play League anymore because of dynamic queue.

Here is a few reasons why we want Solo Q, incase you forgot or if u even care riot.

1.Premades lead to a Very Toxic gaming environment for solo/new players. you are guaranteed to be unnecessarily harassed/reported by premades for any mistake or even for just not doing what they expect in a teamfight. Making solo players and new players get pissed and dislike the game/community. 

2. Solo Q is a more balanced test of your skills! you dont have to play matches where every time the enemey team has advantages like voicechat/friends that only camp your lane/ set picks and bans before the match even starts.

3. It gives your game even more diversity! Giving your players another game mode to compete/advance in is a great idea and a simple one! The good aspects far outweighs the bad aspects. This will lead to a better gaming experience for your players and attract new players as well as old players that have left, leading to a happier/larger player base which equals more money for you!

So that being said, we are not asking u to get rid of any current game mode, just add this one please!
